name: AniSlide Puzzle Pop!
description:
How to play:

  • Swipe in a direction to move all animals on the board (or use arrow keys/WASD)
  • Same animals will merge to a new animal
  • Last turn can be reverted pressing the "repeat last turn" button (looks like an arrow to the left)
  • Game is lost when no more moves are possible, but when a new game is
    started you can press the "repeat last turn" button to get another chance
  • Game is won when the elephant is created, but you can still continue to increase your score
  • On the android version, your highscore is submitted to Google Play
    Leaderboards when a game is lost, won or a new game is started
  • On itch.io, you can create a snapshot of your score (press V ore open settings) and post it to the comments of the game
  • I will keep the leaderboard updated so you can brag about your score ^^

This is the very first game that I have created and released, so I really look forward to your comments, opinions and advice.

The game is currently available on Google Play in early access with a 50% discount on removing ads.

Credits:

Some assets in this game were created by incredible and generous artists that provide their game art for free.
 
This includes the following artists from opengameart.org

* Matthew Pablo - https://opengameart.org/content/caketown-cuteplayful
* rezoner - https://opengameart.org/content/happy-arcade-tune
* wubitog - https://opengameart.org/content/3-pop-sounds
* LeeZH - https://opengameart.org/content/applause
* bevouliin.com - https://opengameart.org/content/golden-trophy-game-ornament

Orangefreesound.com

* Alexander - http://www.orangefreesounds.com/elephant-sound/

Thank you all for your generosity!
